text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-1-1/" title="1 Corinthians 1:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Paul, called *to be* an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, and Sosthenes *our* brother,

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-2/" title="1 Corinthians 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Unto the church of God which is at Corinth, to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus, called *to be* saints, with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord, both theirs and ours:
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-3/" title="1 Corinthians 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Grace *be* unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and *from* the Lord Jesus Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-4/" title="1 Corinthians 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 I thank my God always on your behalf, for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-5/" title="1 Corinthians 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 That in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and *in* all knowledge;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-6/" title="1 Corinthians 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you:
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-7/" title="1 Corinthians 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 So that ye come behind in no gift; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-8/" title="1 Corinthians 1:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Who shall also confirm you unto the end, *that ye may be* blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-9/" title="1 Corinthians 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 God *is* faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-10/" title="1 Corinthians 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and *that* there be no divisions among you; but *that* ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-11/" title="1 Corinthians 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 For it hath been declared unto me of you, my brethren, by them *which are of the house* of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-12/" title="1 Corinthians 1:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Now this I say, that every one of you saith, I am of Paul; and I of Apollos; and I of Cephas; and I of Christ.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-13/" title="1 Corinthians 1:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Is Christ divided? was Paul crucified for you? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul?
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-14/" title="1 Corinthians 1:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 I thank God that I baptized none of you, but Crispus and Gaius;
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-15/" title="1 Corinthians 1:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-16/" title="1 Corinthians 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And I baptized also the household of Stephanas: besides, I know not whether I baptized any other.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-17/" title="1 Corinthians 1:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the gospel: not with wisdom of words, lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-18/" title="1 Corinthians 1:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-19/" title="1 Corinthians 1:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 For it is written, I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-20/" title="1 Corinthians 1:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 Where *is* the wise? where *is* the scribe? where *is* the disputer of this world? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world?

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-21/" title="1 Corinthians 1:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God, it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-22/" title="1 Corinthians 1:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 For the Jews require a sign, and the Greeks seek after wisdom:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-23/" title="1 Corinthians 1:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 But we preach Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-24/" title="1 Corinthians 1:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 But unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-25/" title="1 Corinthians 1:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-26/" title="1 Corinthians 1:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, *are called*:

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-27/" title="1 Corinthians 1:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-28/" title="1 Corinthians 1:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 And base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, *yea*, and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are:
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-29/" title="1 Corinthians 1:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 That no flesh should glory in his presence.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-30/" title="1 Corinthians 1:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:
<a href="../1-Corinthians-1-31/" title="1 Corinthians 1:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 That, according as it is written, He that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.
